Actions.Name: Acrobatics
Actions.Description: Dash 2. This action can interrupt and split up other actions or movement.

Actions.Name: Steam Hammer
Actions.Exceed: Deals bonus damage, dazes foe, and gain +1 action.

Actions.Name: Rev Hammer
Actions.Description: The [name] revs the steam hammer, granting it +1 boon, increasing its range by 1, granting it unerring, and causing a secondary explosion as an area effect after the ability resolves, dealing 3 damage to all foes inside the area.

Actions.Name: Steam Shroud
Actions.AreaEffect: An ally in range is marked. While marked, they gain stealth at the start of their turns, and have evasion if there are no other characters adjacent.

Actions.Name: Steam Blast
Actions.AreaEffect: Characters take 3 damage. Blinded characters take 3 damage twice instead.
